GlossaryRelatedTerms.description: Has A / Is A lineage information about a glossary Term reporting the lineage

isRelatedTerms.description: The relationship Is A with glossary term

hasRelatedTerms.description: The relationship Has A with glossary term

values.description:
The relationship Has Value with glossary term.
These are fixed value a term has. For example a ColorEnum where RED, GREEN and YELLOW are fixed values.

relatedTerms.description: The relationship isRelatedTo with glossary term
